text: Soapnet was an American basic cable network. It was owned by the Disneyâ€“ABC Television Group division of The Walt Disney Company. It was launched on January 20, 2000. In 2010, Disney announced that Soapnet would be replaced by the new preschool-oriented network Disney Junior, which launched on March 23, 2012. The channel ceased operations on December 31, 2013. Category:American television channels Category:2000 establishments in the United States Category:2013 disestablishments in the United States
title: Soapnet
